description: There are command injection vulnerabilities in the underlying Soft AP Daemon service that could lead to unauthenticated remote code execution by sending specially crafted packets destined to the PAPI (Aruba's Access Point management protocol) UDP port (8211). Successful exploitation of these vulnerabilities result in the ability to execute arbitrary code as a privileged user on the underlying operating system.

product.name: Aruba InstantOS and Aruba Access Points running ArubaOS 10

enisaIdProduct.product_version: InstantOS or ArubaOS (access points) 8.11.x.x: 8.11.2.1 and below.
